objectives: Understand what a fraction means (part of a whole).
Give examples using shapes and real life items.

steps.text: A fraction shows part of a whole. It has two numbers: the top is the numerator and the bottom is the denominator.
If a pizza is cut into 4 equal slices and you eat 1 slice, you ate 1 out of 4. That is written as 1 over 4.
If a chocolate bar has 8 equal pieces and you eat 3, what fraction did you eat?
